articles.title: What is the SAVE America Act that mandates voter ID? - BBC
articles.description: Democrats say the legislation disenfranchises voters, while Republicans say it is necessary to stop voter fraud.
articles.content: An estimated 21 million Americans do not have documents proving their citizenship readily available, and 2.6 million lack any form of government-issued photo ID, according to the Brennan Center for J… [+112 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Ward Agius
articles.title: Mehmet Oz's vaccine call is 'too little, too late' - DW.com
articles.description: Measles is still spreading in the US but calls from government officials for Americans to vaccinate now won’t be enough to keep the country from losing a quarter-century of success eradicating the disease.
articles.content:
What you need to know
  • Measles cases have risen for over a year in the US and the country is likely to lose its "measles-free" status.
  • Other world regions had lower case numbers in … [+4625 chars]

articles.title: Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy: The true story behind the mysterious and tragic US icon - BBC
articles.description: Alongside husband JFK Jr, Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy was one half of America's great 1990s golden couple, before their untimely deaths. A new drama is set to explore her struggles.
articles.content: She is also the subject of a new nine-part drama from Ryan Murphy, creator of American Horror Story and American Crime Story. The first season of his latest franchise Love Story is about the courtshi… [+2193 chars]
